Name: Offer them a gold coin
Text: You pull out a gold coin. You have caught their attention. Their eyes follow the coin as you throw it at their feet. They cautiously come closer and examine the coin together as they huddle behind a pillar. Passage seems safe. What do you do?

Name: Have a look around the temple.
Perhaps the imps know something about the headless corpse.
This must be Roberts body
Text: Judging by the cut of the neck, this seems to be Roberts body. He was sacrificial lamb in a devilish ritual. This must be connected to the curse!

Name: Examine upside down cross
Text: Such an unholy symbol! You destroy this affront to your lord without hesitation!

Name: Go back up to the statue room
Use the cross on them
Text: The moment your cross begins to shine with holy light, the imps all start screaming with pain as they burst into flames. Within seconds they vanish back into the pits of hell!

Name: Shoot them
Text: The imps run around cowering as time and time again you reload the crossbow and shoot the damn vermins one by one until they are all vanquished.

Name: Use holy water on them
Text: You pour the contents of the vial in a puddle on the floor then proceed to grab the struggling imps one by one, then throw them at the puddle. The evil imps melt in agony.

Name: Burn them with fire
Text: You aproach the imps menacingly and they huddle together in fear. You pour the oil in a circle around them and ingite it. Quickly enough the flames drown out the shrieks of pain. The path is cleared.

Name: Blow them up with nitro!
Text: "You place yourself saftely behind a pillar and then toss the vial of nitroglycerin at the imps. A loud explosion fills the temple up with smoke. As the view clears the imps are "everywhere". Two of the pillars have collapsed. The path is cleared."

Name: Hold her down and perform a ritual to lift the curse.
TargetName: Mistress is defeated and the curse is lifted

Name: End her
Text: You place yourself saftely behind a pillar and then toss the vial of nitroglycerin at the imps. A loud explosion fills the temple up with smoke. As the view clears the imps are 'everywhere'. Two of the pillars have collapsed. The path is cleared.
TargetName: Mistress defeated but the curse remains
